籤詩版本二:
Whale ya kasance baya canzawa kuma yana kiyaye kogin, ya kasa tashi da fatan sama.
Canje-canje na ban mamaki a nan gaba, Xu Jun ya tsallake ƙofar dragon
詩意:
Wannan hexagram yana nuna hoton whale da bai canza ba.
Yi haƙuri a cikin komai kuma ku jira lokaci.
解曰: Dole ne ku jure. Yi haƙuri da haƙuri. Dole a jira har sai lokacin ya zo. Har yanzu shaharar tana nan.
籤詩故事一:
◇Su Qin Bu Di
A lokacin Yaƙin Jihohi, Su Qin, ɗan ƙasar Luoyang, ya bauta wa Gui Guzi a matsayin malaminsa.
Su Qin ya lobbi Sarkin Qin kuma ya rubuta sau goma sha biyu, amma Sarkin Qin bai yarda da hujjarsa ba. Bayan ya dawo gida rigar gashinsa ta yage, kud’i ya k’are, ya isa bakin k’ofar a gafe, matarsa ​​ta yi banza da shi, surukarsa ba ta yi masa girki ba.
Su Qin ya ji kunya da fushi, don haka ya sami Taigong Yin Fu (littafin fasahar yaki) ya karanta shi cikin fushi. Lokacin da kuka ji dimuwa da kasala, kawai ku soki cinyarki da awl kuma ku sake karantawa idan ya yi zafi.
Daga baya, an yi amfani da ka'idar He Cong (He Zong) don hada kan kasashe shida a kan Qin. Ya ja kunnen Sarki Zhao kuma ya zama firaministan kasashe shida.
聖意: Ba ni da dadi a gida, har yanzu ina son neman arziki, rashin sa’a, ciniki, aure yana da wahala, Liujia alheri ne ga masu tafiya a kasa, gonaki lafiya, tsutsotsin siliki mai kyau, Dabbobi shida marasa kyau, bacewar mutane, karar jama’a da hijira. abubuwan da suka bata, cututtukan kudu maso gabas, addu'ar kariya, tsaunuka da kaburbura.
